targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM (
VALUES ('conflicts',  (SELECT conflicts FROM pg_stat_database WHERE datname = $db))
       , ('temp_files', (SELECT temp_files FROM pg_stat_database WHERE datname = $db))
      -- , ('numbackends', (SELECT numbackends FROM pg_stat_database WHERE datname = $db))
      -- , ('temp_bytes', (SELECT temp_bytes FROM pg_stat_database WHERE datname = $db))
      ,  ('deadlocks', (SELECT deadlocks FROM pg_stat_database WHERE datname = $db))
      -- ('blk_read_time', (SELECT blk_read_time FROM pg_stat_database WHERE datname = $db))
     ) i(metric,value)
     
union
SELECT  'months until AV_FREEZE_MAX_AGE'
      , (diff/(7*24*60*60*xact/epoch)/4 ::int)::int    AS  "weeks remain"
FROM (
    SELECT  S.datname
       , extract (epoch from (now()-pg_stat_get_db_stat_reset_time(datid)))  AS epoch
       , xact_commit + xact_rollback                                         AS xact
       , current_setting('autovacuum_freeze_max_age')::int  - age(datfrozenxid)       AS diff
    FROM pg_stat_database S JOIN pg_database D  ON (S.datname = D.datname)
        WHERE D.datname = $db 
)i

SELECT $__time(ts), 1000* response AS response
        -- , 1000* avg(response) OVER(ORDER BY ts ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS sma

FROM response_time
WHERE 
 $__timeFilter(ts) 
 AND host = $host
 AND cluster = $cluster

SELECT $__time(ts), response 
FROM response_time
WHERE 
 $__timeFilter(ts) 
 AND host = $host
 AND cluster = $cluster

SELECT  1000*percentile_disc( .95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY response)
FROM
    (SELECT response, ts
    FROM response_time
    WHERE host = $host
       AND cluster = $cluster
       AND  $__timeFilter(ts)
       AND  ts > now() - '65 minutes'::interval
       AND  md5 = (SELECT last(md5,ts) FROM response_time)
   ) i

SELECT
  $__time(ts)
  , datname AS metric
  ,size     AS lessons 
FROM
  scale.db_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND cluster = $cluster 
  AND host = $host
 -- And ts > now() - '20 minutes'::interval

SELECT
  $__time(ts)
  , datname AS metric
  ,size     AS lessons 
FROM
  scale.db_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND cluster = $cluster

panels.description: facts for each database in the cluster
panels.title: xact  per db

panels.description: % xact that rolled back at db=$db
panels.title: % rollbacks for "$db"

targets.rawSql:
SELECT name, setting,unit
FROM pg_settings
WHERE name IN ('checkpoint_timeout', 'bgwriter_lru_maxpages', 'bgwriter_lru_multiplier',
               'checkpoint_timeout', 'log_checkpoints____','checkpoint_flush_after')
ORDER BY name

SELECT name, setting
FROM pg_settings
WHERE name IN  (
      'effective_io_concurrency' , 
     'fsync'  ,                  
     'max_replication_slots' ,    
     'synchronous_commit' ,       
     'wal_compression',          
     'wal_level')
ORDER BY name

SELECT
 now() AS time
, application_name AS metric
, pg_xlog_location_diff( pg_current_xlog_location(), replay_location)
FROM pg_stat_replication
